sub_title: Projectmanager at Centric Solution Engineering BV
summary:
Projectmanagement (traditional as well as Agile).

My goal is working on new projects challenging me with respect to teambuilding. Agile projectmanagement does so because of the absolute critical success factor of 'teambuilding'. This  critical success factor is: build a team enabling to create accepted (project) structure in informal environments.

Specialties: Projectmanagement especially in Agile environments, where teambuilding is a critical success factor.

projects.title: FCI
projects.description:
As Projectmanager on behalf of Centric Solution Engineering responsible for project coordination regarding the transition of the legacy platform for factoring services into a modernized platform based on current techniques. The project comprises development of the new software solution and transition as replacement for the current platform available to partners of FCI.

Keywords: .Net, Azure, SQL Server.

contributors.headline: Projectmanager at Centric Solution Engineering BV

projects.title: NL-Alert (New release development and delivery)
projects.description: As Projectmanager on behalf of Centric Solution Engineering responsible for software changes regarding additional functionality needed on the NL-Alert platform. Changes have been defined by Dutch government and are implemented in close cooperation with Nationale Politie. Latter is responsible for coordination of day to day operations and changes on the NL-Alert platform.

contributors.headline: Projectmanager at Centric Solution Engineering BV

projects.title: EY e-Invoicing
projects.description: Development and implementation of a custom made SaaS based e-Invoicing solution service for EY to be used within EMEIA countries; starting Germany and the Netherlands. The service will be hosted by Centric and setup by using the Centric DataXchanges Online platform.

projects.title: CBIS (stedelijk)
projects.description: As projectmanager responsible for delivery of an eLearning training for the CBIS (Calamiteiten BVH Informatie Systeem). The eLearning is accompanying the CBIS systeem which will be rolled out in the Netherlands after closure of the pilot phase. The eLearning training has its focus on target audience BHV within non-industrial organizations.

contributors.headline: Projectmanager at Centric Solution Engineering BV

projects.title: CBIS (Calamiteiten BHV Informatie Systeem)
projects.description:
Projectmanager responsible for the development of a BHV alerting system (CBIS) including eLearning.
CBIS supports alerting BHV members of companies in aswell industrial areas as urban areas in order to meet self-reliance. Self-reliance applicable during the first phase of (company) incidents when official emergency services (police, ambulance, fire-workers) are not yet on location and be ensured by BHV organizations.

CBIS has passed its proof of concept. The system is running in pilot which will be closed in short time and will be followed by roll out in the Netherlands.

projects.description: As projectmanager responsible for delivery of an eLearning training for the CBIS (Calamiteiten BVH Informatie Systeem). The eLearning is accompanying the CBIS systeem which will be rolled out in the Netherlands after closure of the pilot phase. The eLearning training has its focus on target audience BHV within industrial organizations.

projects.title: Landelijk Asbest VolgSysteem (LAVS) / Omgevingsloket Online (OLO)
projects.description: As system integrator acting and responsible on behalf of central government for Infrastructure and Milieu. Responsibility areas are: 1.Coordination between parties involved in development of a new application with respect to  information provisioning and registrations regarding asbest used in objects all over the Netherlands aswell as underlying infrastructure/hosting needed for it; 2. Coordination with respect to operational environment 'OmgevingsLoketOnline'.

contributors.headline: Projectmanager at Centric Solution Engineering BV

projects.title: NL-Alert
projects.description:
Development of the broker application part within the NL-Alert system. The broker application, as part of NL-Alert and used by control rooms in the Netherlands, enables the Dutch government to quickly inform citizens by means of messaging based on cell broadcast technics. The broker application supports message definition and area selection with respect to emergency information and regional scope of emergency.
Broker development is carried out by Norwegian partner UMS carrying out development activities as subcontractor of Centric.

projects.title: Rituals Cosmetics Enterprise B.V. - EDI message and routing migration
projects.description:
As Projectmanager on behalf of Centric Solution Engineering responsible for EDI broker changes with respect to EDI message and routing migration for Rituals Cosmetics Enterprise B.V. needed to support their backend migration from Exact to Microsoft Dynamics AX.

Centric's EDItool is the message broker between Rituals and the external customer environment with respect to EDI retail messages. The message broker needs to adapt connection ability to MS Dynamics AX ERP.
